Description: The following statement contains a magic number: try {  	bank.Deposit (100);  }  catch (InvalidOperationException ex) {  	// Bank is still closed.  	Console.Error.WriteLine (ex.Message);  }
The following statement contains a magic number: bank.Deposit (100);

The following statement contains a magic number: try {  	bank.Deposit (-1000);  }  catch (ArgumentOutOfRangeException ex) {  	// Cannot deposit a negative amount.  	Console.Error.WriteLine (ex.Message);  }
The following statement contains a magic number: bank.Deposit (-1000);
The following statement contains a magic number: bank.Deposit (10);
